entry.title: 150 Shades of Bat
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,838Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 32

Summary: “I require your assistance with something important,” Damian said, opening the notebook with solemn reverence. “It’s a delicate matter.”Tim squinted at a tab labeled ‘frottage, rooftop edition.’ “Is it tax fraud? Please tell me it’s tax fraud.”“No,” Damian said. He flipped three pages and adjusted a glossy photo held in place by a literal sewing needle. “There are 150 kinks I must test and evaluate prior to pursuing any romantic entanglements.”Tim stared.Damian continued. “I have organized them by category, severity, potential for logistical complications, and whether they require a pulley system.”“WHAT?!”Damian raised an eyebrow. “There’s no need to yell.”“You kidnapped me to show me your sex spreadsheet?!”

entry.title: Not Until You Say Goodbye
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 92,396Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 34

Summary: What if the end of the world wasn’t just about destruction—but about love rewriting fate?Do you love the Batfamily? Do you love Evangelion?Never heard of one, the other, or either?Doesn’t matter—this story is for YOU.Join Tim Drake as he navigates a futuristic world full of towering robots, emotional breakdowns, and extremely loud brothers.Even if you’re new to either fandom, don’t worry—every character is introduced clearly, and the story blends the chaos of Evangelion with the heart (and dysfunction) of the Batfamily to create something entirely new.If you're here for plot, we’ve got it.If you're here for smut, we’ve got that too (clearly tagged and totally skippable if you prefer to keep things sweet and safe.)

entry.title: Finding Tim Drake
entry.summary:
Author: Chaotic_evil_stuff

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 432,727Chapters: 121/150Kudos: 714

Summary: Tim returns to Gotham after long time with the Titans to focus more on Tim Drake rather than Red Robin and regain some normality. Damian, now 20 years old, has developed some respect for Tim in his absence. He tries his very best to make Tim feel welcomed. The fresh start for both boys allows them to become more than rivals, and much more than friends too.Their relationship unfolds as their lives change for better, for worse and with new (and unexpected) additions to their daily life. How will they manage them, and how will it change them?  This is part 1 of my series and is still ongoing and updated regularly. Smut is on separate chapters, so if you're not into that, this can be read without it and still have a full cohesive story.

entry.title: in a cruel nature
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,719Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 116

Summary: “I don’t understand why I have to accompany him.” Timothy groaned out as he rolled his eyes at Bruce’s orders. “It’s only for one night, Timothy.” Bruce insisted while maintaining his stoic attitude as he stood before Tim. Despite the lack of the cowl, Bruce spoke to him as if he was giving orders on the field, the gravitas in his voice was heavy. “Despite his nasty attitude, I doubt that there isn’t any desperate teenager out there willing to put up with it for one night.” Tim bitterly replied, and he wasn’t lying either. Damian had grown up into a fine man, inheriting both of his parents’ innate charm and attractiveness. “Please, Ducky.” Bruce pleaded, his voice softer with fondness as he called Tim his favorite pet name. “Fucking hell, alright!” Tim finally conceded at the sight of Bruce begging. “I’ll go to prom with Damian.” Under his breath, he added. “What a shitty fucking promposal.” “Do try to make yourself look decent, Drake.” At that moment, Damian appeared at the door. “I refuse to make a fool out of myself.” Damian takes Timothy Drake as his date for the Prom.

Summary: "I have found my beloved" Damian announces over breakfast.Bruce nearly chokes on his oatmeal."What makes you say that?" "I am an al Ghul, we just know." Bruce's ten year old son said and Bruce stared helplessly at Alfred. The butler hadn't stopped his movement once, still busying himself with dusting the dining room. He was on his own."And who do you think your beloved is?"“Timothy Jackson Drake. I believe you know his mother?""Hn" he replied. He didn't like Janet Drake, per se, but Timmy did seem like a lovely young boy. He supposed the boy had a pretty face.or:the damitim simp fic

entry.title: Infatuated With You
entry.summary:
Author: RinRin222

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,222Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 26

Summary: All it takes to crumble Tim’s relationship with the Wayne’s, specifically Bruce, is for an infatuation drug to be administered. Everything tumbles down after that, and he’s left alone to try to build it all back up. Only… Maybe he’s not as alone as he thinks, in those feelings or that building.
